item.title: SL GREEN REALTY CORP 10-K
item.description: SL GREEN REALTY CORP, which is in the Real Estate Investment Trusts [6798] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 17, 2023 had 51232 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
